mapper.select: select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode,dstart, dend ,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate order by dstart desc
select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode,dstart, dend ,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode} and dstart > #{day} order by dstart

select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from (select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode}) where dplace='디뮤지엄' or dplace='대림미술관' order by dstart desc

select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from (select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode} and dstart > #{day}) where dplace='디뮤지엄' or dplace='대림미술관' order by dstart

select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend , dstart,dtitle2 from (select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode}) where dplace='구슬모아당구장' order by dstart desc

select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend , dstart,dtitle2 from (select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode} and dstart > #{day}) where dplace='구슬모아당구장' order by dstart

select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend , dstart,dtarget,dinformation,dtitle2 from (select did, dtitle, dplace, dfile,dsfile, dcode, dend ,dstart,dtarget ,dinformation,dtitle2 from dmu_ticket where dend < sysdate and dcode = #{dcode} and dstart > #{day}) where dtarget=#{dtarget} order by dstart
